ComicInfo.Summary:
Sally and Ben continue to report from the streets of New York City as the military begins an all-out assault against the Hulk.
The mayor of Providence, Rhode Island, holds a music competition to choose the official heroes of the city.
Danny and Korg question Thermo about the death of ARCH-E.
ComicInfo.Title: Embedded: Behind Enemy Lines [Part Three]; War Is Heck [Part 2]; Costume Division: Death of an Android [Part Two]; Credits and Recap
